availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William J. Calhoon (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt )

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of John Calhoon and Bitha Wells Calhoon. Married Elizabeth Sanders in Calloway County in October 1856. Farmer in Trigg County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 86
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, p. 55B
